meanings.definition: The protective care of God or of nature as a spiritual power.
meanings.sent1: The providences of nature ensure the animals have food and shelter.
meanings.sent2: We trust in the providences of God to guide us through difficult times.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel thanked the providences for hiding nuts in the tree.
meanings.sent4: The providences of the forest whispered secrets to those who listened.
meanings.sent5: In the story, the providences of the wind protected the lost travelers.

meanings.sent1: His providences included saving money for unexpected expenses.
meanings.sent2: She always carries an umbrella as a providence for sudden rain.
meanings.sent3: The providences of packing extra snacks saved the day on the hike.
meanings.sent4: The providences of having a spare key prevented a lockout.
meanings.sent5: The providences of studying in advance helped him ace the test.
